code-vb.pre-render: For Each grItem As DataGridItem In grdDocuments.Items For Each ctrl As Control In grItem.Controls If ctrl.Controls.Count > 0 Then For Each sctrl As Control In ctrl.Controls If TypeOf sctrl Is HyperLink And sctrl.ID <> "editLink" Then Dim lnk As HyperLink = TryCast(sctrl, HyperLink) lnk.Text = Tokenize(lnk.Text, ModuleConfiguration, False, False) lnk.ToolTip = Tokenize(lnk.ToolTip, ModuleConfiguration, False, False) lnk.NavigateUrl = Tokenize(lnk.NavigateUrl, ModuleConfiguration, False, False) ElseIf TypeOf sctrl Is LiteralControl Then Dim lit As LiteralControl = TryCast(sctrl, LiteralControl) lit.Text = Tokenize(lit.Text, ModuleConfiguration, False, False) End If Next Else Dim cell As TableCell = TryCast(ctrl, TableCell) cell.Text = Tokenize(cell.Text, ModuleConfiguration, False, False) End If Next Next
